title: Project manager @ Alfasun Brussels.
description: Going through the complete sales process of renewable energy sources with potential clients. Project initation, conception and planning were all part of my tasks. Keeping the customer up-to-date and satisfied with the installation  was the main priority.

title: Ambulance driver @ M&M Ghent.
description: Here I learned how to work in a high stress environment, where decisions had to be made under stress. Also working closely with colleagues for up to 15 hours a day and relying on them was a challenge to overcome. The decision to work here was certainly a good decision for my development as a person.

title: Marriage.
description: Got married during lockdown, there was no party.

title: Computer programming.
description: Studying at Artevelde University of Applied sciences. Courses include: computer systems, user interface prototyping, programming, data management, IT entrepreneurship,..

title: Moving to Estonia.
description: My wife and I have purchased a beautiful home in southern Estonia, in the village of Soe.

title: Internship & workplace.
description: This is where we work together!
